name: Lag Boi
description:
This is "One Life", a game I made in 5 days with Unity.

The idea is simple. It's a singleplayer game, but you lag.

Yes I intentionnaly made the game mechanics based on a delayed timer.

Also you have a rocket launcher.

And a friendly dog.

What could go wrong?

CONTROLS

Keys W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys : Move 

Left Mouse Click : Launch Rocket

Also if you kill the dog, you die.

HOW I MADE THE GAME
